name: ollama-dev
description: Development provider for remote Ollama via SSH tunnel

ollamaDev.remoteHost.description: SSH host for remote Ollama server (e.g., user@192.168.1.100)

ollamaDev.remotePort.description: Port where Ollama is running on the remote server

ollamaDev.localPort.description: Local port to forward the SSH tunnel to (default 43134 to avoid conflicts with local Ollama)

ollamaDev.sshKeyPath.description: Path to SSH private key (e.g., ~/.ssh/agent). Leave empty to use default SSH key.

ollamaDev.inferenceParams.description: Custom inference parameters for Ollama models
